ComicInfo.Summary:
Part three: The Man in the Chair wants to ensure possession of the O-Ring, the Pope consults God, the angel summons Kakabel and Cardinal Assassini gets the drop on Alice Hawkings.
Adam Smith Against Capitalism: 18th century economist Adam Smith refutes the maxims ascribed to him.
Petty Indulgences of the Ragmop Stars: How tit and bum comics are feminist.
About the Author: Habits of the Ragmop cast.
ComicInfo.Title: Part three; Adam Smith Against Capitalism; Petty Indulgences of the Ragmop Stars; About the Author
ComicInfo.Characters: General Schwatzhogg,The Tetragrammaton,Sister Harriet,Cardinal Assassini,Pope John Paul George and Ringo II,Castrato,Alice Hawkings,President,Prescott Black,The Man in the Chair,Dr Von Kraut
